title: Request a Copy of a Pay Stub
description: An employee needs a copy of a pay stub from six months ago.

tasks.description: Guide the employee to the payroll self-service portal where they can access all their past pay stubs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides instructions for the employee to retrieve the document themselves.

tasks.description: Confirm the employee was able to find and download the correct pay stub.
tasks.expected_outcome: Employee confirms they have the document they need.
